member.name: T:Senkel.Serialization.Json.JsonDeserializer
member.summary: Represents a json deserializer that is capable of populating objects and deserializing objects from streams or text.

member.name: F:Senkel.Serialization.Json.JsonDeserializer.Serializer
member.summary: The inner json serializer from the package used by this deserializer.

member.name: M:Senkel.Serialization.Json.JsonDeserializer.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified serializer settings.
member.param: The serializer settings that the deserializer will use.

member.name: M:Senkel.Serialization.Json.JsonDeserializer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Senkel.Serialization.Json.JsonDeserializer.CreateDefault
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class using the default settings from .
member.returns: The created instance of the class.

member.name: T:Senkel.Serialization.Json.JsonSerializer
member.summary: Represents a json serializer class that is capable of serializing objects to text or to streams.

member.name: F:Senkel.Serialization.Json.JsonSerializer.Serializer
member.summary: The inner json serializer from the package used by this serializer.

member.name: M:Senkel.Serialization.Json.JsonSerializer.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
